text:
NAEB Headquarters
1U Gregory Hall
Urbana, Illinois
mm
TO: New members of the Board - Adams, Coleman, Harley, and Paulu
FROM: Skomia
DATE: November 5, 195h
I am finally at the point where I can get out a brief note to you. On their
way to you are many materials with an earlier not© from me. This is the first
installment in an effort to be sure you are completely oriented on everything
we are involved in. If you have any additional questions as a Board member,
pleas© let me have them and 1*11 do ay best to provide brief, honest answers.
I expect, as Schooley has said, that the next year will be an important and
in some respects a crucial arse. I want to be sure that you have all the back¬
ground necessary for the decisions which will need to be made concerning con¬
tinuation of financial support for Headquarters, the many other projects in
the works, and relations of the HAEB with the JCET, NCCET, ETKC, and other
organisations. I expect that Schooley will be calling a meeting to go over
all these .matters as soon as the need for decisions and discussions justifies
it. Until then our informal way of keeping you informed will be to send you
copies of everything important, frequently with hastily handwritten notes.
Let us hear from you.
HJStcp
Dunn
Aufcmis
